response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and enhance your business operations. This product, designed with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled features, is tailored to meet the unique needs of companies like yours. Our team has spent considerable time and resources developing this solution, making it a valuable asset for any organization looking to streamline processes, increase efficiency, and drive growth.

Considering its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it offers, we are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to experience the full potential of our product while also securing a competitive advantage in your market.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or schedule a demo to see how our product could transform your business. We are confident that it will exceed your expectations and contribute to your company's success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
